thread.section_title: eDreams opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre eDreams | www.edreams.es | 4 de 66
thread.title: E-n George Frater
thread.title_full: eDreams evaluado por E-n George Frater

author: E-n George Frater
title: E-n George Frater
text:
I have not enjoyed the experience booking with Edreams. Duplicate payments were taken out of my bank account and no body was able to explain why this was. After one week of calling, being hung up on and completely ignored I tried once again and got Sanjana, who was very professional and helpful. She was able to carry out my requests in 40 minutes as apposed to 5 unsuccessful days prior to calling her.
But for this young lady I may have called to police if my bank were not able to raise a dispute regarding 2 payments (900 pounds) taken from my account. I am still wafting for the two refunds for these unauthorized payments, but at least I now have email confirmations, which Sanjana was kind enough to send me. You need more agents like her and less like the other 3 I spoke with during the week.
